summary: With this mod you can decapitate those pesky children. Mod also includes new high resolution outfits for all children, each child has new hairstyles and different eye colors,  and a new face model.
descriptionHtml:
[color=orange][size=5]Updates[/size][/color]
[b]Update 2[/b]
>All child races added so now you can decapitate all children in skyrim.
>New high res fine clothes added.
>Modified face texture
>All child races are playable and killable

[b]Update 1[/b]
>FIxed some hair models
>New head model added

[color=aqua][size=5]Decapitate Children Mod[/size][/color]
Ever found children to be annoying and couldn't find anything brutal enough to teach them a lesson.
Introducing the [color=orange]Decapitate Children Mod[/color] where all your problems can be laid at rest.

Now you can decapitate all the pesky children in skyrim, 38 in all.

Mod has other features including:
[size=4][color=orange]>[/color][/size]New high resolution outfits with 6 different colors each for male and female child. Plus in Update 2, male children are able to wear 2 types of high res fine clothes.
[size=4][color=orange]>[/color][/size]New face models
[size=4][color=orange]>[/color][/size]Each child has a different type of hair style which are used by adults.
[size=4][color=orange]>[/color][/size]Each child has a different eye color.

[color=aqua][size=5]Video[/size][/color]
[color=orange][b]Halloween in Skyrim[/b][/color]
This video does not showcase the mod but demonstrates how halloween is celebrated in skyrim.
[youtube]SYxfB1lFPsk[/youtube]

[color=orange][b]Skyrim - Decapitate Children Showcase[/b][/color]
This video showcases the mod by showing the new face models, new outfits and the decapitations themselves.
Note: this video has the old face model not the new face model in update 1
[youtube]uQqfan98Gk4[/youtube]

If you have any problems with the mod feel free to post a comment and I will get back to you.

[color=aqua][size=5]Installation[/size][/color]
1. Using Nexus Mod Manager simply click on this mod and activate it.
2. Manually drag and drop the Data folder into the Data folder in the Skyrim directory and overwrite.
author: sulezraz
